Every time I read the word "party" in the same context as PESU I get reminded of that email the management sends out every year lmao

FYI for those who don't know, every year just after freshers join parents are sent an email saying their kids are taking part in illegal activities on campus by taking part in parties and doing dangerous things thus making quite a few home environments chaotic. They also ask parents to keep a closer watch on their children xD.

Also, college isn't like what's depicted in movies/shows, atleast here. Get that image out of your head before your expectations get smashed to pieces in the first month. Nobody's throwing parties every other week - people are struggling to find time to breathe and relax here from the constant stress.

Fests have been discussed before on this subreddit, search and you shall find out more.
